Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to private information
Summary: Amends the definition of "private information" to include birth dates, home addresses or phone numbers or any combination thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง899-aa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to private information
